channel.title: How to compile and run server and client on linux
channel.description:
Hello im on linux and im having trouble running and compiling.
[u][i][b]Client[/b][/i][/u]
run.bat: [code]@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]
Compiler.bat: [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
[u][i][b]Server[/b][/i][/u]
run.bat: [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
Compiler.bat: [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
Can someone help me run these?
Thanks, Mikexd5

item.title: How to compile and run server and client on linux
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

[quote=“mikexd5, post:1, topic:409609”]Hello im on linux and im having trouble running and compiling.

Client

run.bat:

@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Compiler.bat:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Server

run.bat:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Compiler.bat:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

Can someone help me run these?

Thanks, Mikexd5[/quote]

Make both your run and compiler a .sh…

item.title: How to compile and run server and client on linux
item.dc:creator: @mikexd5 mikexd5
item.description:
@mikexd5 wrote:

Hello im on linux and im having trouble running and compiling.

Client

run.bat:

@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Compiler.bat:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Server

run.bat:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Compiler.bat:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

Can someone help me run these?

Thanks, Mikexd5
